name: Scrape Latest News

on:
  # This makes the job run automatically every day at 10:00 AM UTC
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 10 * * *'
  # This allows you to manually run the job from the Actions tab on GitHub
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  scrape:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Check out repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: '3.11'

      - name: Install Python dependencies
        run: |
          pip install playwright pandas fuzzywuzzy python-levenshtein
          python -m playwright install --with-deps

      - name: Run news scraper
        run: python scraper_news.py

      - name: Commit and push if there are changes
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "Automated News Scraper"
          git config --global user.email "actions@github.com"
          git add news.db
          # The following command only commits if there were changes to the file
          git diff --quiet --exit-code news.db || git commit -m "ðŸ“° Update news database with latest articles"
          git push
